remarks: Lemma for ~ haushmph and similar theorems.  If the topological property ` A ` is preserved under injective preimages, then property ` A ` is preserved under homeomorphisms.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2015.)
statement:
haushmphlem.1 $e |- ( J e. A -> J e. Top ) $.
haushmphlem.2 $e |- ( ( J e. A /\ f : U. K -1-1-> U. J /\ f e. ( K Cn J ) ) -> K e. A ) $.
haushmphlem $p |- ( J ~= K -> ( J e. A -> K e. A ) ) $.
$d A f $.
$d J f $.
$d K f $.
